name: Squats
description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and lower your hips down and back, as if sitting in a chair.

name: Push Ups
description: Keep your body in a straight line while lowering and pushing up using your arms and chest.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward with one foot and lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.

name: Deadlifts
description: Lift a weight from the ground to hip level while keeping your back straight and core engaged.

name: Plank Rows
description: Hold a plank and row dumbbells alternately, engaging your back and core.

name: Overhead Press
description: Press weights upward from shoulder height until arms are fully extended.

name: Bent Over Rows
description: Bend at the waist and pull weights toward your torso while keeping your back straight.

name: Glute Bridges
description: Lie on your back, bend knees, and lift hips to form a straight line from shoulders to knees.

name: Jump Squats
description: Perform a squat and jump up explosively, landing softly and repeating.

name: Burpees
description: Full body movement involving a squat, jump, plank, and push-up in one fluid motion.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Start in plank position and run knees toward your chest quickly, one at a time.

name: High Knees
description: Run in place bringing your knees as high as possible each step.

name: Skaters
description: Hop sideways from one foot to the other, mimicking a speed skater motion.

name: Jumping Lunges
description: Alternate lunges with a jump between each switch of legs.

name: Plank Jacks
description: Jump feet in and out while maintaining a plank position.

name: Tuck Jumps
description: Jump high and bring your knees to your chest in the air.

name: Downward Dog
description: Yoga pose where hands and feet are on the mat and hips pushed upward to form an inverted V.

name: Warrior Ii
description: Lunge pose with arms extended out to the sides, engaging legs and core.

name: Cat Cow
description: Alternate arching and rounding the spine while on hands and knees for spinal flexibility.

name: Childs Pose
description: Kneel and fold your body forward to rest between your thighs and stretch the back.

name: Cobra
description: Lie on your stomach and lift your chest with hands under your shoulders.

name: Tree Pose
description: Balance on one leg while placing the other foot on the inner thigh and hands at chest or overhead.

name: Bridge Pose
description: Lie on back and lift hips while keeping feet and shoulders grounded.

name: Seated Twist
description: Sit with legs extended or crossed and twist your torso to one side for spinal flexibility.

name: Jump Rope
description: Use a rope to jump continuously, engaging the whole body.

name: Jogging In Place
description: Run in place lifting your knees slightly and swinging your arms.

name: Butt Kicks
description: Run in place kicking your heels up toward your glutes.

name: Step Touch
description: Step side-to-side while touching one foot next to the other and moving arms rhythmically.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Jump while spreading your legs and raising your arms overhead, then return to start.

name: Stair Climbers
description: Step quickly up and down on stairs or an elevated platform for cardio.

name: Fast Feet
description: Run quickly in place with rapid, short steps.

name: Neck Rolls
description: Slowly roll your neck in a circular motion to release tension.

name: Seated Forward Fold
description: Sit with legs extended and fold forward to stretch hamstrings and back.

name: Supine Twist
description: Lie on your back and twist your legs to one side to stretch the spine.

name: Hamstring Stretch
description: Bend at the waist while keeping legs straight to stretch the back of the thighs.

name: Shoulder Rolls
description: Roll shoulders forward and backward to release tension.

name: Legs Up Wall
description: Lie on your back with legs extended up a wall for relaxation and circulation.
